courses.title: Beginner Guitar Lessons
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing the guitar, including chords, strumming, and simple songs.

courses.title: Advanced Guitar Techniques
courses.description: Master advanced guitar techniques and take your playing to the next level.

courses.title: Introduction to Singing
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of singing, including breath control, pitch, and tone.

courses.title: Music Theory Basics
courses.description: Understand the basic concepts of music theory to enhance your musical skills.

courses.title: Jazz Piano for Beginners
courses.description: Learn to play jazz piano with simple exercises and techniques.

courses.title: Classical Violin Techniques
courses.description: Explore classical violin techniques and improve your playing skills.

courses.title: Rock Drumming Essentials
courses.description: Learn the essential techniques and rhythms for rock drumming.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Discover the basics of producing electronic music using digital audio workstations.

courses.title: Songwriting Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of songwriting, including lyrics, melody, and structure.

courses.title: Advanced Music Theory
courses.description: Deepen your understanding of music theory with advanced concepts and techniques.
